amendment.description: To protect human health and the environment from the release of hazardous substances by acts of terrorism.

action.text: Amendment SA 3849 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3849.
Amendment SA 3849 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S10215) To protect human health and the environment from the release of hazardous substances by acts of terrorism.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3849 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Corzine.
